Text: Please ignore my pasting errors on the text as i was in a rush to upload this asap. Regardless of the text this is defiantely the VALENCIA Qualifying, sorry guys but tpb edit facility on torrents hasnt worked for months so i cant edit it!

jorrell0733: Edit doesn't work, but you can always remove the torrent, ask us to clear the hash (via IRC or at the forum) and upload it again.
